lines.text: I know you. You are the brother... How perfect. I will send you to hell... to join your brother!
I've been there... for 10 years! AAAHHHH!

Blood Brothers]
It's like a Bruce Lee movie without Bruce.
I'm listening to a fucking drunk.
Worthless piece of shit American.
I heard that.
I wanted you to!
[from trailer]
What are you doing back here in Thailand?

[referring to Khan]
You can help me. Teach me how to stop him.

[remembers his defeat at Khan's hands and is doubtful that he can help]
What I have to offer, might not be enough.
This is for Molly, this is for Prang, this is for my brother, and this, is for the life you stole from me, you bastard!

[whilst shoving an electric heater in the face of a bad guy]
Does that hurt, huh? *Good*!
My methods get results!

[after beating up several students]
What a fucking waste of time!

[shouts]
Let... the girl... go!

[Prang's training has taken its toll on Jake and he decides to call it quits, puzzling Prang]
Why you stop?

[angrily]
If this is your idea of training, you're crazy!
You want to be ready for Khan? Then keep going!
Forget about it! All this shit is doing is burning what little time I have left!
This is the way that I learned!
Yeah? And how far did that get you?

[insulted]
WHAT?

[walks away a bit and then faces Prang again with frustration]
YOU LOST! I CAN'T AFFORD TO LOSE!
[Jake walks away angrily and Prang smashes a wooden dummy in frustration]
How many guys do you think I have to fight?
How many do you want?
Touch me in the night and I'll kill you.
The monkey loves that kind of talk.
You're no ordinary fighter.
Thanks... I'll add you to my personal fan club.
It's not meant to be a compliment.
You've never faced a real kickboxer.
